description: Synthetic .NET 10 project for dotCover coverage testing

expected_assemblies.name: CoverageDemo
expected_assemblies.description: Main library with Calculator, StringUtils, and UntestedClass

expected_full_coverage_types.name: Calculator
expected_full_coverage_types.reason: All methods (Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide) have complete test coverage

expected_partial_coverage_types.name: StringUtils
expected_partial_coverage_types.reason: Reverse() tested, Truncate() untested, IsValidEmail() partially tested

expected_uncovered_types.name: UntestedClass
expected_uncovered_types.reason: No tests exist for this class

expected_low_coverage_methods.name: Truncate
expected_low_coverage_methods.reason: Intentionally not tested to demonstrate partial coverage

notes: Coverage percentages may vary slightly based on dotCover version
UntestedClass should have 0% coverage as no tests target it
Calculator should have 100% coverage with all branches covered
